title: LOSJON ZA TELO NATURAL RADIANCE, NIVEA, 400ML

instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Na kožo nanesite bogato in enakomerno zgladite. Izogibajte se stiku z oblačili, dokler se losjon popolnoma ne vpije. Po nanosu si umijte roke. Za boljši rezultat uporabite piling pred prvo uporabo.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopropyl Palmitate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Dihydroxyacetone, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Sodium Acrylate/Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Dimethylacrylamide Crosspolymer, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Parfum.
